To conduct correlative study . OUTLINE : This dose-escalation study . Patients receive oral Azadirachta indica daily day 1-28 . Treatment repeat every 28 day 8 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . After completion study treatment , patient follow every 3 month 1 year .
